name: ConfuciusSays
0:
”Alexa, ask Confucius Says to say something profound.”
”Alexa, ask Confucius Says to tell me something wise.”
”Alexa, ask Confucius Says what does Confucius say.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: confucius says
des: Produces a bogus yet profound quote from someone who may or may not have been Confucius.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
